comment.author: 34747241@N02
comment._content: Nyblin Carl Petter Daniel Dyrenhal 1856-1923... A different Daniel Nyblin?

comment.author: 48220291@N04
comment._content: Thank you for an interesting question! There were several photographers with the last name Nyblin working in the late 1800/early 1900. Daniel Georg Nyblin (1826-1910) and Carl Petter Daniel Dyrenhal Nyblin (1856-1923) were two different photographers (I think Daniel Georg Nyblin was Carl Petter Daniel D. Nyblins uncle). You can read more about both of them (and the other Nyblins) in the National Library/Preus Museum Photography Register: www.nb.no/nmff/fotografer.php
